title: New: Young Wonder – To You (Sacred Animals Remix)
body: **[Mmoths](https://soundcloud.com/mmoths)** crashed at Josh’s place this week, if that doesn’t tell you how much we love the music coming from Ireland at the moment, then I don’t know what does. **[Sacred Animals](http://www.facebook.com/sacredanimals?fref=ts)** aka Dublin’s **Darragh Nolan** is another bro on our hit list, (you could totally crash at mine, holla at me man). His remix of Cork based group **[Young Wonder](https://www.facebook.com/youngwondermusic)** and their track ‘_To You’_, is dramatically different, yet still retains the other worldly quality that made the original so exciting. Odd that I used the term ‘other worldly’ to describe a track that’s full to the brim with Indian samples, I’m not a xenophobe I promise. Anyway, before this article comes dangerously close to ‘life journalism’ or a therapy session, take a listen to the track.
